title: [BUG] Avif encoding is silletly unsupported
body:
### Description

Encoding to AVIF image is not working, but no information is provided just returned SKData is null.

### Code

```cs
internal static Stream EncodeSkBitmapToStream(SKBitmap bmp)
{
	var data = bmp.Encode(SKEncodedImageFormat.Avif, 90);
	return data.AsStream(true);
}
```

### Expected Behavior

NotSupportedException is thrown or working encoding

### Actual Behavior

_No response_

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.3 (Current)
